panels.description: Memória heap utilizada

targets.expr: (sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="heap"}) * 100) / (sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="heap"}))

panels.title: HEAP USED

panels.description: Utilização de CPUUtilização de CPU
panels.title: CPU UTILIZATION

panels.description: Memória non-heap utilizada

targets.expr: (sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="nonheap"}) * 100) / (sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="nonheap"}))

panels.title: NON-HEAP USED

panels.description: Média de uso da CPU
panels.title: LOAD AVERAGE

panels.description: Número de requisições no último minuto
panels.title: TOTAL REQUESTS

panels.description: Número de erros 500 no último minuto
panels.title: ERROR 500

panels.description: Latência média por minuto

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by(le) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by(le) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by(le) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.25, sum by(le) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])))

panels.title: LATENCY AVERAGE

panels.description: Taxa de erros nos últimos 5 minutos
panels.title: ERROR RATE

panels.description: Tempo de resposta no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m]) / (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m]))

panels.title: RESPONSE TIME

panels.description: Número de requisições por endpoint no último minuto
panels.title: REQUEST COUNT

panels.description: Duração média de requisições no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/topicos"}[1m]) / (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/topicos"}[1m]))

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m]) / (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m]))

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m]) / (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m]))

panels.title: AVERAGE REQUEST DURATION

panels.description: Duração máxima de uma requisição no último minuto
panels.title: MAX REQUEST DURATION
